content: The process of letting go of something that never materialized or that ended prematurely can be challenging, but it's a necessary step in healing and moving forward. Dwelling on the past and what could have been can be a waste of energy and limit your ability to grow and find happiness in the future. You might want to consider seeking support from loved ones or a mental health professional to help you navigate through this process. Remember, it's okay to take time to grieve and process your emotions, but it's also important to give yourself space to eventually move on and find new opportunities for happiness.
